<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Yaezhing (Minister of Blood)](/Deities.aspx?ID=184)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Commit assassinations for hire, strike unseen, carry out punishment for convicted criminals

**Anathema** Show mercy to a target, take credit for your assassinations, refuse to punish a lawfully convicted criminal

**Follower Alignments**
LE, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Dexterity or Intelligence

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)

**Divine Skill** [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15)

**Favored Weapon** [Shuriken](/Weapons.aspx?ID=79)

**Domains** [Death](/Domains.aspx?ID=7), [Duty](/Domains.aspx?ID=45), [Pain](/Domains.aspx?ID=24), [Trickery](/Domains.aspx?ID=31)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)

</column>
name: Yaezhing (Minister of Blood)
